New Records: Kyle Schwarber's 19th postseason home run, a record for left-handed hitters
Key Match Events: Alek Thomas hit a dramatic, score-tying, pinch-hit two-run homer off Craig Kimbrel in the eighth inning
Gabriel Moreno hit the go-ahead RBI single four batters later
Philadelphia's bullpen imploded in the eighth inning
Paul Sewald struck out three in the ninth to secure the save in Game 4
Post-Match Reflections: Diamondbacks manager Torey Lovullo expressed pride in the team's performance and resilience
Alek Thomas reflected on the team's belief and the crazy season and playoffs
Evan Longoria emphasized the power of belief and the team's ability to put pressure on opponents
Geraldo Perdomo highlighted the team's ability to compete despite their young age and lower payroll
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game featured a bullpen game for the Diamondbacks due to a shortage of starting pitching
The crowd at Chase Field erupted in support of the Diamondbacks, imitating the Citizens Bank Park crowd that has supported the Phillies
